text: Current logo Aktuaalne kaamera (abbreviated AK) is an Estonian television news program shown in Eesti Televisioon. First AK was broadcast on 11 March 1956. Therefore, AK is the oldest television program in Estonia, which is still running. Since October 1958, AK is broadcast every day. Earlier, AK was broadcast every week. The name "Aktuaalne kaamera" is derived from German television program "Aktuelle Kamera". ==References== ==External links== *Aktuaalne kaamera, ERR.ee Category:Mass media in Estonia Category:Television news shows
title: Aktuaalne kaamera
